column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zhao says : " This will truly be one for the history books , General Iroh .
#Text=History is not always kind to its subjects .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I suppose you speak from experience , but rest assured .
#Text=This will be nothing like your legendary failure at Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I hope not , for your sake .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Tell the captains to prepare for first strike .
#Text=" Iroh says : " We 'll be landing soon .
#Text=Do you have a plan ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm working on it , Uncle .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What 's wrong ?
#Text=We have to go !
#Text=" Yue says : " No , Sokka , wait , I ca n't see you anymore .
#Text=Not at all .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=We 're just friends .
#Text=" Yue says : " I wish we could just be friends , but I like you too much and it 's too confusing to be around you .
#Text=I 'm marrying someone else !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You do n't love him , do you ?
#Text=You do n't even seem to like him .
#Text=" Yue says : " But I do love my people .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're not marrying them .
#Text=" Yue says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=I have duties to my father , to my tribe .
#Text=I have to do this .
#Text=Goodbye .
#Text="
